@graph.schema:name: Deep Learning
@graph.schema:description: The subset of machine learning methods based on artificial neural networks (ANNs) with representation learning. The adjective 'deep' refers to the use of multiple layers in the network.
@graph.schema:applicationCategory: Computer Vision, Speech Recognition, Natural Language Processing, Machine Translation, Bioinformatics, Drug Design, Medical Image Analysis, Climate Science, Material Inspection, Board Game Programs
@graph.schema:inspiration: Artificial Neural Networks inspired by information processing and distributed communication nodes in biological systems.
